entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:59 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Freezing rain with rain early this evening and with ice pellets overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to a few flurries and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
